greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Self-convolution with "addition" played by bitwise XOR.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(1)=1, a(n) = sum ( a(i) XOR a(n-i), i = 1 .. n-1).
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[BitXor[a[i], a[n - i]], {i, 1, n - 1}]; Table[a[n], {n, 30}]
program: f xs = y : f (y : xs) where
y = sum $ zipWith xor xs $ reverse xs :: Integer
results.author: _Jacob A. Siehler_, Nov 10 2011
